If you like salty food come here. gah damn üòÇ I just had this for the first time in over a year and I won't be buying again. The salt level on this food is incredibly high.

This is one of the worst food experiences in the Bronx. If it weren't for the deals offered, I would never step foot in this God-forsaken location. It's horribly managed and the "service" shouldn't even be called service. It's almost like the workers have genuine contempt for the customers and don't care to assist people paying their money in any way. Even ordering online doesn't help to avoid the unpleasantness of the staff. It saddens me deeply that this is what we're given while other locations in the city are given so much more.

If I can give them no stars,  I would‚Äôve my experience was unacceptable. They didn‚Äôt send me my kids chicken fingers so I called the store. No one picks up goes into a voicemail that is full. I sent corporate a message four days later they still haven‚Äôt responded, this is unacceptable. It‚Äôs disgusting. So I didn‚Äôt get to eat and lost my money.

This is my second bad review on this location. I‚Äôll start with a message to the entire staff by saying that just because you‚Äôre in the Bronx, doesn‚Äôt mean you don‚Äôt have to care. I ordered from this Wingstop and had it delivered me and my family was eating and my mom went to pick up her drink and   found a roach in it. She called the Wingstop in 149th that she ordered from she had told them about the issue and they accused my mother of lying. And said that she put it in her drink why would we do that? He said that we were lying and that we are crazy. He and his staff kept hanging up when we brought it up and threatened to call the cop and said to look at his reviews and said that he‚Äôs the best. Yet half his reviews are 1 star or 2. The Manager is rude and disrespectful. Never order from this location.

The wing are pretty decent, but the drinks they give you are ROOM temperature and the fries are WAY too salty and are disgusting. The cheese fries aren't actually cheese fries and they just give you cheese sauce for your fries. It's stupid. It was my first time ordering WingStop and will for sure be my last. Definitely not worth the price, so glad I got it for half off on DoorDash.

Not the best location, as of now thanks to covid, the place is still clean. Take out only for the moment. Staff are patient, but I expect that to diminish once the city opens up at full 100%. The wings are good, but expensive. 6 little wings with fries and a drink for 13 dollars. Geez, thank God they give lots of fries. Good luck trying to find free parking, your best bet is to pay 4 parking and then walk a few blocks to the location. Or you can go by bus or train.

Some workers here have attitude. Only place that can't switch my fries for corn. Messed up my order a few times.

Every piece of my order was wrong. I wanted an hour for my order just for it to be all wrong. I didn‚Äôt even get any of the drinks I ordered. This place is absolutely incompetent.

This visit was very disappointing. Waited 40 minutes for ten wings. There were about 15 uber drivers upfront complaining and waiting for their pickups. New walk-in customers were told that they couldn't order because they were too backed up.  Outside the store filthy inside young workers with poor customer service yelling every order 30 minute wait. My food cold by the time I got it and the fkat soda it came with made it even more unappealing. Friday night not a good time ti eat here.

Absolutely horrible service. Food was missing from the order. Corn was green from the box of fries being placed on top. Buffalo sauce all over the wing stop bag because no one cared in how they placed our food. We spoke to the ‚Äúmanager‚Äù but‚Ä¶

These people are thieves, and as usual running scams. They don't offer DELIVERY AT ALL, they run it throught DOORDASH, when they mess up the order or don't deliver it and they have charged your card, they will give you the run around how Wingstop is not responsible for the delivery you have to call Doordash, who in turn says they don't have your information because it was done through Wingstop, so you have to go back to contact Wingstop again.

So they will cancel your orders and then when you ask for your money back, they will give you what they want not what you paid and they took from your account.

Nowhere on their app it says that their delivery is run through Doordash, or that they are not responsible to give you your money back if Doordash (their chosen partner in business) doesn't deliver your food.

Workers are NOT ready to handle a large amount of people yet, it is a newly opened location. The food was excellent despite having waited 50 mins for 3 order of wings. Again, the food was amazingly delicious. Would still go eat from there again

Gave them a 2nd try. The wings are greasy, they will probably mess up a minor part of your order (forget sauce, switch out diet dr pepper for a bottle of water) and honestly they are pretty expensive (the size of their tenders is quite‚Ä¶

Terrible wingstop to order from. They're terrible at counting boneless wings in an order. I ordered 20. How did I get 16 only? Also, if you order any brownies, they won't give you any. I've ordered from them on uber eats twice already.

They hardly answer the phone. And three times when I placed a order here I was missing stuff. I like the food better than another wing stop I tried. But I wish management was better with handling customer concerns and needs.

Came into get a gift card as a stocking stuffer for my son since he frequents Wingstop after school. None of the employees knew how to assist me. Additionally the wait time is always a minimum of 15 mins and that's if you're lucky.

The manager Oliver is a very unprofessional and disgusting excuse for management. Called to complain about my order being incorrect. And he has the audacity to tell me that he will not issue me a refund because I called already to tell them‚Ä¶

This place takes almost as long to serve your order as the year they took to open after being built. Be prepared to wait 45 minutes to an hour to be served. Beside that, due to covid there is no indoor seating, the place is quite small and‚Ä¶

The chicken tenders and fries in the lunch combo were oily. Tasted like they used the same oil all week without straining the oil. I will definately not eat at wingstop ever again.

Short-staffed, improper deployment, constant bottleneck. Even if you ordered online be prepared to wait 20 minutes to pay and receive your COLD food. The 2 stars given is because the food is good, everything else is poorly executed.
